    • Method Detail

      • decodeUsingCharsetIfPossible

        public static java.lang.String decodeUsingCharsetIfPossible​(byte[] toDecode,
                                                            java.lang.String charset)
        Tries to decode a given byte array using the given charset. As a fallback StandardCharsets.UTF_8 will be used.
        Parameters:
        toDecode - the byte array to decode
        charset - the charset to be used for decoding
        Returns:
        the decoded string

      • getEncoding

        public static java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getEncoding​(byte[] data)
        Returns an Optional of the charset that has been used or an Optional.empty() if no charset could be found.
        Parameters:
        data - the byte array that the charset should be found of
        Returns:
        Optional of the charset or an Optional.empty()
